alert.note: Alert for Banks; Jackson; Madison (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 6:47PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Banks, northeastern Jackson and Madison Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 647 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Commerce, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Commerce, Danielsville, Nicholson, Comer, Colbert, Ila, Pocataligo, Diamond Hill, Apple Valley, Neese and Banks Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
